item.title: ‘Despicable Me’ Writer Ken Daurio to Pen ‘Zita the Spacegirl’ Movie Adaptation (Exclusive)
item.description: Sycamore Studios is developing the feature project that counts Marvel veteran Jeremy Latcham as executive producer.
